column2: "You took out all those insect-like Darkers! I'll never forget what you've done for me today!"
"Huh? There's more huge swarms of insect Darkers out there? No way..."
"In that case, I'll just have to do my best to support all the ARKS who go out and fight them!"

"Become a vivid light♪
and fight the darkness♪"
"How was that? Wasn't that a perfect imitation of one of Quna's live shows?!"
